text: Theodore William "Ted" Lange (born January 5, 1948) is an American actor, director, producer, and screenwriter. He is best known for his role as the bartender, Isaac Washington, in the 1970s TV series The Love Boat. Lange was born on January 5, 1948 in Oakland, California. He studied at the Royal Academy of the Dramatic Art. Lange has been married to Mary Ley since 2001. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1948 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American stage actors Category:Screenwriters from California Category:Movie directors from California Category:Movie producers from California Category:Actors from Oakland, California
title: Ted Lange
